snippet: The streaming service has been trying to expand into original programming, especially family friendly shows.
abstract: Netflix says it has acquired the rights to popular children's book series A Series of Unfortunate Events by Lemony Snicket, pen name of Daniel Handler.
lead_paragraph: The streaming service has been trying to expand into original programming, especially family friendly shows.

headline.main: Netflix Acquires Rights to Lemony Snicket Books
